resources.string: This allows you to select what GNSS satellite constellations you\'d like to use
Select which position, velocity and time estimation method you\'d like to use
Below you can configure how the results are calculated

Access to the location service is required.

This application requires location permission to calculate the positioning error. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'GNSS Compare\'.
Location permission is required for this demo.
